Package jtuple

Class TupleSchema

java.lang.Object
jtuple.TupleSchema
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class TupleSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents a schema used to bound the element types of a bound tuple. A tuple schema is essentialy similar to a database schema, through whitch we can define the types of the attributes of a tuple and their names.
See Also:
Serialized Form

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static class  TupleSchema.Builder
    A builder class to construct new tuple schemas.
